name: EvilPuzzles Corporation is Hiring
description:
In this puzzle-platformer game, you have been kidnapped by EvilPuzzles Corporation since they require new puzzlers! They promised to let you go if you fail all of the puzzles because solving not even one of them isn't EvilPuzzles Corporation material. Try and fail all of the puzzles, angering the manager of EvilPuzzles Corporation in doing so!

Controls

  • A, D, Left Arrow, Right Arrow - Moves the character left and right
  • Space Bar - Makes the character jump
  • Left Mouse Button - Clicks through dialogue and selects different options.

Credit

      ZachCreates has done all of the work you see except for the making of the assets you see below. These were not made for this game jam, they are separate assets made by other people entirely. You should still check these assets out, though. They are actually REALLY good! Without them, my game would feel so much emptier.

  • Humble Fonts - Free by somepx (itch.io)
  • ChipTone by SFBGames (itch.io)
  • Perces | OpenGameArt.org
